init flow
func:
var step_list = [
    "STOP",
    "PREP_TANK_A",
    "VENT_TANK_A",
    "START_TANK_A",
    "STOP_TANK_A",
    "DRAIN_SYSTEM_A",
    "PREP_TANK_B",
    "VENT_TANK_B",
    "START_TANK_B",
    "STOP_TANK_B",
    "DRAIN_SYSTEM_B"
]

var sps_status = global.get("sps_status") || {};

if (sps_status["LAST_STEP_NUMBER"] == null) { msg.last_step = "STOP" }
else { msg.last_step = step_list[sps_status["LAST_STEP_NUMBER"]] }

return msg;
